long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jangle Jangle is an audio artwork for the web. Once you've enabled the extension every site you visit will be transformed into a collage of sound elements that you can play by clicking around different elements of the page. 

While Jangle Jangle is enabled via the extension's popup, you will need to enable the audio by clicking the button that appears over each page you visit. 

Have fun!
